scripts.installer: npm install --save-dev run-script-os npm run install
scripts.install:win32: php bin/console app:install && php bin/console doctrine:database:create && php bin/console do:mi:mi && npm install @capacitor/cli --save-dev && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install:default: php bin/console app:install && php bin/console doctrine:database:create && php bin/console do:mi:mi && chown www-data config/jwt -R && chown www-data public -R && php bin/console lexik:jwt:generate-keypair && npm install @capacitor/cli --save-dev && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build:android: php bin/console app:entrypoint:generate && npx cap init --web-dir=public && npx cap add android && npx cap run android && php bin/console app:entrypoint:clear
